Why fly to Dubai with Flyer Club?

Exclusive discounts on Emirates
Access to over 200k hotels & villas
The latest tricks of the travel trade
A highly trained team you can trust
Hands-on customer care

Every client at Flyer Club is assigned a designated travel specialist.

These experts take the time to intimately understand your needs to provide exclusive itineraries and priority support that speaks to your unique travel preferences.

This saves valuable time and money which can be spent doing more of what you love – seeing the world.

We stay abreast of all the latest industry updates so that you don’t have to.

From mileage points hacking to pandemic-related policies and procedures, our extensive knowledge base ensures an exclusive and hassle-free experience at the best possible price point.

Having worked in the industry for many years, we know what works and what doesn’t.

Providing a real live human to help you in the event of an emergency change of plan is crucial to client happiness, which is why we make it our top priority.

Unlike the offers you’ll find online, our quotes come directly from privately negotiated fares and contract rates, far below the market minimum.

These fares are not legally available to the general public and have been secured through many years of close ties with all the major carriers.

© 2022 FLYER-CLUB, INC. All rights reserved.

*All prices shown are in US dollars and include all relevant taxes, fees, and surcharges. All prices are "from" per person, based on business class travel during the weekdays (Monday through Thursday) from the USA, and vary according to the service class selected, the city of departure, the airline, and the route. The East Coast typically has the lowest transatlantic fares, whereas the West Coast typically has the lowest transpacific fares. To avoid immediately competing with the travel supplier's normal retail sales, Flyer Club is unable to identify some travel suppliers or itinerary details online. Savings of up to 73% are shown off the full, unrestricted published fares of major airlines, however exact savings will depend on each fare's specific regulations. Some airlines could charge extra for extra baggage. The prices depend on whether there are seats available in the relevant booking inventory. There are a limited number of seats, and some flights and dates may not have them. The prices are adjustable, and our partner airlines currently offer free exchange and/or cancellation. If a trip is canceled, clients will keep their travel credits with the issuing airline for a year, minus airline fees, unless otherwise specified. If you trade, the fare difference can be charged. The prices and the rules that apply to them are subject to change at any time and without notice. There may be more limitations.
